title: How to Raise Friendship Level in the Pokémon Games

steps.title: Walk 128 steps.
steps.content: Walk 128 steps. This has a chance or raising your entire party's friendship level by +2 points, or +1 level at friendship levels 200 - 255. Generation 7 games include the following: Pokémon Sun, Moon, Ultra Sun, and Ultra Moon. These steps apply to all games in Generation 7, unless otherwise stated. To avoid lowering a Pokémon's level, don't let it faint. Don't use Heal Powder, Energy Root, Revival Herb, or Energy Powder.

steps.title: Get a massage.
steps.content: Get a massage. You can get a message at Konikoni City. This raises your Pokémon's friendship level between +10 to +40 points.

steps.title: Get a friendly drink, lunch, or combo at the food stalls.
steps.content: Get a friendly drink, lunch, or combo at the food stalls. This raises your Pokémon's level between +5 to +20 points, depending on what you order.

steps.title: Visit the hot springs at Isle Avue.
steps.content: Visit the hot springs at Isle Avue. This raises your Pokémon's level +5 points.

steps.title: Battle against the Island Kahuna, an elite four member, or the Champion.
steps.content: Battle against the Island Kahuna, an elite four member, or the Champion. This raises your Pokémon's friendship level +5 points at levels 0-99, +4 points at levels 100 - 199, and +3 points at levels 200 - 255.

steps.title: Level up your Pokémon.
steps.content: Level up your Pokémon. You can level up your Pokémon in battle. This will raise your Pokémon's level +5 points at friendship levels 0 -99, +3 points at friendship levels 100 - 199, and +2 points at friendship levels 200 - 255.

steps.title: Use a Wing.
steps.content: Use a Wing. This raises your Pokémon's friendship level +3 points at levels 0 - 99, +2 levels at levels 100 - 199, and +1 point at 200 - 255.

steps.title: Use vitamins.
steps.content: Use vitamins. These include the following: HP Up, Protein, Iron, Calcium, Zinc, Carbos, PP Up, PP Max, and Rare Candy.

steps.title: Using EV Berries.
steps.content: Using EV Berries. These include the following: Pomeg Berry, Kelpsy Berry, Qualot Berry, Hondew Berry, Grepa Berry, and Tamato Berry.

steps.title: Use a battle item.
steps.content: Use a battle item. This raises your Pokémon's frienship level +1 point at frienship levels 0–199. Battle items include the following: X Attack, X Defense, X Speed, X Sp. Atk, X Sp. Def, X Accuracy, Dire Hit, and Guard Spec.

steps.title: Give a Pokémon the Soothe Bell.
steps.content: Give a Pokémon the Soothe Bell. This increases friendship boosts by 50%.

steps.title: Walk 512 steps.
steps.content: Walk 512 steps. All Pokémon in your party will get a raise in its friendship level of +1 point. These steps apply to the following versions: Gold, Silver, and Crystal. In these games, all Pokémon have a friendship level, instead of just one. Also, there are many changes to the friendship levels in this generation. To avoid lowering a Pokémon's level, don't let it faint, or use Heal Powder, Energy Root, Revival Herb, or Energy Powder.

steps.title: Take your Pokémon to be groomed.
steps.content: Take your Pokémon to be groomed. Depending on who you talked to, and how satisfied the Pokémon is, the friendship level will rise at different rates. Talk to Daisy in Pallet Town, or one of the brothers in the underground at Goldenrod City. Talking to the younger brother will raise your friendship level at a higher rate.

Friendship level will be raised +5 points at friendship levels 0 -99, +3 points at friendship levels 100 - 199, and +2 points at friendship levels 200 - 255. Leveling up at met locations will double the amount of friendship points your Pokémon receive.

steps.title: Raise the level of your Pikachu.
steps.content: Raise the level of your Pikachu. This will give it a boost in its friendship. Friendship level will be raised +5 points at friendship levels 0 -99. It will be raised +3 points at friendship levels 100 - 199. It will be raised +2 points at friendship levels 200 - 255. [1] X Research source Friendship only applies to the Yellow Version, since it was when you could talk to your Pikachu and see how he likes you. When the series started out, there were three games distributed in America. However, it wasn't introduced in Red or Blue versions. Avoid depositing Pokémon and fainting. This lowers Pikachu's friendship level.

steps.title: Use a healing item.
steps.content: Use a healing item. You can use an HP restoring item, or a status condition healing item (other than full heal). This will also raise Pikachu's friendship level. Note that any item will work on raising Pikachu's friendship. It doesn't even have to work. If you try to use a Thunder Stone, it won't raise Pikachu's friendship level. He refuses to use the Thunder Stone every time.

steps.title: Challenging Pokémon Gym leaders.
steps.content: Challenging Pokémon Gym leaders. This will also raise Pikachu's friendship level by +3 points at friendship levels, 0 - 199, and +2 points at friendship levels 200 - 255.
